book.title: The Gift of Perception
book.subtitle: Pathfinders Guidance Series

publication_info.authors: Don and Katie, and Farr and Shatkin

book.copyright_info: The authors and Pathfinders (PET) do make no representations or warranties with respect to the accuracy or completeness of the contents of this booklet. We wish to specifically disclaim all warranties, including without limitation warranties of fitness for a particular purpose.

categories.title: Agriculture and Natural Resources
categories.description: With scientific curiosity in this field, one can work or study in the area of farming, fishing, mining, landscaping, forestry and other related areas. If you have management ability, you can pursue business in these fields.

specializations.title: Mine Cutting and Channeling Machine Operator
Service Oil Operator (Oil, Gas and Mining)

categories.title: Architecture and Building Construction
categories.description: With the ability to organize and plan, create and fix hardware, you can work as an architect, draftsman, plumber, carpenter, mason, painter, electrician and other areas related to designing, assembling and maintaining components of buildings and other structures.

categories.title: Art and Communication
categories.description: Do you love to creatively express your feelings or ideas, communicate news or information and perform? Writing, editing, journalism, public relations, acting, music or dance, painting, sculpture, ceramics or design products or visual displays, photography, broadcast production or dispatching are the career areas for you.

careers.title: Director
careers.description: Stage, Motion Pictures, Television and Radio

categories.title: Business and Administration
categories.description: You can work in a variety of business-related roles, such as managing a business, accounting, marketing, human resources, and more. You can also work in a library, museum where you would help others to expand people's understanding of the world.

categories.title: Education and Training
categories.description: You love to teach other people. You can specialize in a particular academic area and choose a particular student group, such as children, youth, retirees and the physically challenged. You can also work in a library, museum where you would help others to expand people's understanding of the world.

categories.title: Finance and Insurance
categories.description: Your greatest desire is to ensure that businesses have financial security. To find satisfaction, you can play a managerial role in this field. If you like gathering and analyzing information, you can work as a financial analyst or insurance adjuster, banker, insurance agent or customer care provider.

categories.title: Government and Public Administration
categories.description: Do you want to help government provide the needs of the public? You can serve in such areas that contribute to the role of government: public protection, law enforcement, clerical services and development planning, public sector management and related areas.

specializations.title: Child Support, Missing Persons and Unemployment Insurance

categories.title: Health Science
categories.description: You love to provide healthcare needs of people and animals. You can work as a Doctor, specializing in a particular part of the body or be a generalist, a therapist, or nurse. With an interest in technology, X-rays and new methods of diagnosis are possible career areas.

categories.title: Hospitality, Tourism and Recreation
categories.description: You concern yourself with the personal needs of others, such as hygiene, good food and drink, comfortable lodging away from home and recreation. Services in hotels, restaurants, airplanes, beauty parlors etc are areas to satisfy this interest. Enjoy sports or games? Work for an athletic team

categories.title: Human Service
categories.description: Your priority is helping others improve their social, mental, emotional or spiritual well-being. Counseling, social work, religious work, taking care of children or the elderly as well as investigating to identify the social needs of others, are possible career areas for you.

specializations.title: Social Worker (Mental Health and Substance Abuse)
Probation Officer and Correctional Treatment Specialist

categories.title: Information Technology
categories.description: You are interested in designing, developing, managing and supporting information systems. You can work with hardware, software, multimedia, or integrated systems, helping resolve complex problems as a software engineer or systems analyst, servicing computers, machines like ATMs, cash registers etc.

specializations.title: Network Systems and Data Communication Analyst

categories.title: Law and Public Safety
categories.description: You love to uphold people's rights, protect life and property by using authority and enjoy inspecting or investigating. You can work in law, law enforcement, fire fighting, military, crime investigation and other related fields.

categories.title: Manufacturing
categories.description: Your interest is in processing raw materials into intermediate or finished products by using machines and hand tools. You can work in industry, utility companies and related agencies, cutting and grinding metal and plastics parts into shapes, assembling, moving, installing, or repairing devices. You could manage workers in this field if leadership appeals to you.

specializations.title: Marking And Identification Printing Machine Operator

categories.title: Retail & Wholesale Sales and Service
categories.description: You are good at persuading others to believe in an opinion. By using sales and promotional techniques you may enjoy selling in any field of interest. You could also pursue a career in customer care service if you prefer to help people buy or sell.

specializations.title: Sales Representative (Wholesale, Manufacturing and Technical Products)

categories.title: Scientific Research, Engineering and Mathematics
categories.description: You love to discover, collect, analyze and apply information about the natural world, you can work as a researcher in any field of interest to solve life's problems. You could study engineering and help create new machines, structures and processes.

categories.title: Transportation, Distribution and Logistics
categories.description: You desire to help the smooth movement of people and materials from one place to another. You can drive or pilot a plane, manage a transportation service or help keep vehicles on their assigned schedules and routes.
